languages.text: "Жаль, жаль, очень жаль... но если вдруг передумаете — просто загляните в помещение топки, и вытащите оттуда контейнер — он в дальнем углу, его легко заметить!"
"Such a shame, such a terrible shame... but if you change your mind — just pop into the furnace and get the container out. It's in the far corner, you can't miss it!"
languages.original_text: "Жаль, жаль, очень жаль... но если вдруг передумаете — просто загляните в помещение топки, и вытащите оттуда контейнер — он в дальнем углу, его легко заметить!"

traits.locale_text: "Such a shame, such a terrible shame... but if you change your mind — just pop into the furnace and get the container out. It's in the far corner, you can't miss it!"
"Such a shame, such a terrible shame... but if you change your mind — just pop into the furnace and get the container out. It's in the far corner, you can't miss it!"
"Such a shame, such a terrible shame... but if you change your mind — just pop into the furnace and get the container out. It's in the far corner, you can't miss it!"
"Such a shame, such a terrible shame... but if you change your mind — just pop into the furnace and get the container out. It's in the far corner, you can't miss it!"
"Such a shame, such a terrible shame... but if you change your mind — just pop into the furnace and get the container out. It's in the far corner, you can't miss it!"

languages.text: “太遗憾了，真是太遗憾了……不过，如果您改主意的话，只要钻进炉子里，把箱子拿出来就行了。它就在远处的角落里，您肯定能找到！”
languages.original_text: "Such a shame, such a terrible shame... but if you change your mind — just pop into the furnace and get the container out. It's in the far corner, you can't miss it!"

traits.locale_text: “太遗憾了，真是太遗憾了……不过，如果您改主意的话，只要钻进炉子里，把箱子拿出来就行了。它就在远处的角落里，您肯定能找到！”

languages.text: «Es una pena, una pena espantosa... Si cambia de opinión, entre al horno y saque el contenedor. ¡Está en la esquina del fondo, no tiene pérdida!».
languages.original_text: "Such a shame, such a terrible shame... but if you change your mind — just pop into the furnace and get the container out. It's in the far corner, you can't miss it!"

traits.locale_text: «Es una pena, una pena espantosa... Si cambia de opinión, entre al horno y saque el contenedor. ¡Está en la esquina del fondo, no tiene pérdida!».

languages.text: 「そうですか、実に残念です…でも、気が変わりましたら炉の中からコンテナを取ってきてください。一番奥にあるので見落とすことはないはずです！」
languages.original_text: "Such a shame, such a terrible shame... but if you change your mind — just pop into the furnace and get the container out. It's in the far corner, you can't miss it!"

traits.locale_text: 「そうですか、実に残念です…でも、気が変わりましたら炉の中からコンテナを取ってきてください。一番奥にあるので見落とすことはないはずです！」

languages.text: "Das ist schade, wirklich sehr schade ... aber falls Ihr Eure Meinung ändert – holt einfach den Container aus dem Ofen. Er ist im Eck gegenüber, Ihr könnt ihn nicht übersehen!"
languages.original_text: "Such a shame, such a terrible shame... but if you change your mind — just pop into the furnace and get the container out. It's in the far corner, you can't miss it!"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist schade, wirklich sehr schade ... aber falls Ihr Eure Meinung ändert – holt einfach den Container aus dem Ofen. Er ist im Eck gegenüber, Ihr könnt ihn nicht übersehen!"

languages.text: « Quel dommage... Si jamais vous changez d'avis, rendez-vous dans le four et récupérez le conteneur. Il se trouve dans un coin au fond, vous ne pourrez pas vous tromper ! »
languages.original_text: "Such a shame, such a terrible shame... but if you change your mind — just pop into the furnace and get the container out. It's in the far corner, you can't miss it!"

traits.locale_text: « Quel dommage... Si jamais vous changez d'avis, rendez-vous dans le four et récupérez le conteneur. Il se trouve dans un coin au fond, vous ne pourrez pas vous tromper ! »

languages.text: "Yazık, çok yazık... Yine de fikriniz değiştirirse fırına uğrayıp sandığı çıkarın. Uç kısımda, görmemeniz imkânsız."
languages.original_text: "Such a shame, such a terrible shame... but if you change your mind — just pop into the furnace and get the container out. It's in the far corner, you can't miss it!"

traits.locale_text: "Yazık, çok yazık... Eğer fikrinizi değiştirirseniz fırına uğrayın ve kutuyu çıkarın. Uç kısımda, görmemeniz imkânsız."
